reuters.title: SINO-U.S. VENTURE IN CHINA TO MAKE RINSING AGENTS
reuters.body: <Ecolab Co> of the United States signed a contract with North China Industrial Co to set up the first Sino-U.S. Joint venture in China to make rinsing agents, the New China News Agency said. It said total investment in the new venture, <Ecolab Chemical Industrial Co>, is 2.4 mln dlrs. It said the venture will be based in Shanghai and produce agents for use in hotels and industries. It gave no further details. REUTER 
